item.description:
To prevent a repeat of the migrant ship tragedy off Greece last year, which cost some 600 lives, rules that make the EU's border and coast guard agency dependent on national authorities need to change, an official probe says.https://t.co/uYivOPPoTO

item.description:
Ghana's parliament passed a bill on Wednesday to severely restrict LGBTQ rights and advocacy, prompting rebukes from activists and a US warning that the legislation threatened freedoms of all citizens in the west African nation.https://t.co/wpI2QT6Hul
